data.title: Prussian Blue ✠ on Gab: 'World Series of Poker shut my account down becaus…'
data.meta_description:
Prussian Blue ✠ on Gab: 'World Series of Poker shut my account down because my username offended someone. 
They literally banned me IP address from ever using the app again. I know this may sound like a trivial thing but I've had that account for years and I am one of the best players on that entire site. 
Apparently one white guy had a problem with my user name and took it all the way to tech support and made a thing of it. A WHITE guy! (His Facebook picture was his user).
I have had an entire Poker table change their avatars to the Jewish stars of David to stand in solidarity against me and STILL nobody has done this to me. But one white guy sees the username "Swastika88" and gets so offended he destroys years worth of Poker effort because he's offended.
White traitors are insurmountably worse than Jewish scumbags.'
data.text: To use the Gab Social web application, please enable JavaScript. Alternatively, try one of the native apps for Gab Social for your platform.
